name: Great Relic of Inaccessibility
description: Increases the range of the skill by 2 yards.

name: Great Relic of Higher Mastery
description: Grants a 10% chance to immediately use the skill again without a cooldown.

name: Great Relic of Concentration
description: Grants a 10% chance to reduce the skill's cooldown by 40%.

name: Great Relic of Energy Retribution
description: Grants a 10% chance to drain 20% of the enemy's maximum energy.

name: Great Relic of Energy Efficiency
description: Reduces the energy cost of the skill by 40%.

name: Great Relic of Punishing Ability
description: Increases the damage of the skill by 12%.

name: Great Relic of Defense Ignoring
description: Enhances the skill's Penetration by 10%.

name: Great Relic of Sudden Strength
description: Increases the skill's Critical Hit chance by 8%.

name: Great Relic of Indomitable Blow
description: Increases the skill's Critical Hit Strength by 20%.

name: Great Relic of Refreshment
description: Grants a 10% chance to heal the character for 20% of maximum health.

name: Great Relic of Mass Retribution
description: Grants a 10% chance to deal 40% of the skill's damage to all enemies within 2 yards of the target.

name: Great Relic of Spirit Rebirth
description: Grants a 20% chance to restore the energy consumed by the skill.

name: Great Relic of Multiple Spells
description: Increases the maximum number of targets affected by the skill's effect by 3.

name: Great Relic of Menace
description: Increases the amount of aggression generated by the skill by 60%.

name: Great Relic of Salutary Healing
description: Grants a 20% chance to heal the character by the same amount as the ally when used on an ally.

name: Great Relic of Continuous Effect
description: Increases the duration of the skill's effect by 40%.

name: Great Relic of Dispelling
description: Grants a 20% chance to remove a skill buff from the enemy.

name: Great Relic of Curse Removal
description: Grants a 30% chance to remove a skill harmful effect from the character.

name: Great Relic of Killing Insight
description: Restores the energy consumed by the skill when the target dies from it.

name: Lesser Relic of Inaccessibility
description: Increases the range of the skill by 1 yard.

name: Lesser Relic of Higher Mastery
description: Grants a 5% chance to immediately use the skill again without a cooldown.

name: Lesser Relic of Concentration
description: Grants a 10% chance to reduce the skill's cooldown by 20%.

name: Lesser Relic of Energy Retribution
description: Grants a 10% chance to drain 10% of the enemy's maximum energy.

name: Lesser Relic of Energy Efficiency
description: Reduces the energy cost of the skill by 20%.

name: Lesser Relic of Punishing Ability
description: Increases the damage of the skill by 6%.

name: Lesser Relic of Defense Ignoring
description: Enhances the skill's Penetration by 5%.

name: Lesser Relic of Sudden Strength
description: Increases the skill's Critical Hit chance by 4%.

name: Lesser Relic of Indomitable Blow
description: Increases the skill's Critical Hit Strength by 10%.

name: Lesser Relic of Refreshment
description: Grants a 10% chance to heal the character for 10% of maximum health.

name: Lesser Relic of Mass Retribution
description: Grants a 10% chance to deal 20% of the skill's damage to all enemies within 1 yards of the target.

name: Lesser Relic of Spirit Rebirth
description: Grants a 10% chance to restore the energy consumed by the skill.

name: Lesser Relic of Multiple Spells
description: Increases the maximum number of targets affected by the skill's effect by 1.

name: Lesser Relic of Menace
description: Increases the amount of aggression generated by the skill by 30%.

name: Lesser Relic of Salutary Healing
description: Grants a 10% chance to heal the character by the same amount as the ally when used on an ally.

name: Lesser Relic of Continuous Effect
description: Increases the duration of the skill's effect by 20%.

name: Lesser Relic of Dispelling
description: Grants a 10% chance to remove a skill buff from the enemy.

name: Lesser Relic of Curse Removal
description: Grants a 15% chance to remove a skill harmful effect from the character.

name: Terrible Relic of Bloodsucking
description: Heals the character for 7.5% of the damage caused by the skill.

name: Magic Relic of Killing Health
description: Restores 50% of the character's health when killing an enemy at or above your level with the skill.

name: Great Relic of Energy Stability
description: Reduces the energy regeneration required while the skill is active by 50%.

name: Lesser Relic of Energy Stability
description: Reduces the energy regeneration required while the skill is active by 30%.

name: Icy Relic of Ruthlessness
description: Guarantees a critical strike against enemies whose health is less than 30% of maximum when attacking with the skill.

name: Icy Relic of Cruelty
description: Guarantees a critical strike with the skill when used under Rage.

name: Icy Relic of Intractability
description: Adds 40% to the skill's effect when used under Rage.

name: Magic Relic of Resilience
description: Adds 40% to the skill's effect when the character's health drops below 30% of maximum health.

name: Terrible Relic of Control
description: Increases the duration of the skill's effect by 25% with a chance equal to Health Steal.
